title.value: Особенности выращивания Spirulina platensis при использовании светодиодных источников света
Features of growing of Spirulina platensis using the LED sources of light

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Biological Series

person.name: Kozel, N.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering

abstract.value: New high-effective LED lamps appear an important alternative energy source for plant growing and obtain widespread occurrence. LED lighting possesses high coefficient of luminous efficiency and long service life. But the questions of application of LED lighting for adequate growth and development of plants along with optimal combination of different spectral characteristics of LED lamps appear still unclarified. Therefore, the main goal of the research presented in the article is carrying out a comparative analysis of efficiency of use of new ultra-bright LED lamps for growing of Spirulina platensis. The perspective of the use of LED lighting for growing of Spirulina platensis is demonstrated in the article. The mechanisms affecting the efficiency of such lighting for Spirulina platensis growing are examined. Changes of productivity and pigment content of blue-green algae while growing under LED lamps instead of fluorescent lamps are analyzed. Different colors of LED lamps and their influence on productivity of Spirulina platensis is researched.
